item.title: Weekly Crypto News: Mempool Solana Shuts Down, Police Integrate Cardano Into Their Work, WhiteBIT And FC Barcelona Launch New Course
item.content:encoded:
摘要：这些信息是积极的。
最近发生了一些重要的加密货币新闻。首先，以太坊Dencun升级于3月13日发布，这是备受期待的升级。接下来，关于Solana网络的消息传出，该网络不断增长并推动加密市场。然后，比特币价格上涨，达到57,000美元，显示了加密货币市场的稳定性。此外，由于美国政府的立场趋于宽松，对加密货币市场产生了积极影响。最后，波卡项目也在做出巨大努力，以提高加密货币市场的实用性和可用性。

The cryptocurrency market is constantly evolving. Every day, new integrations, updates, and other important events take place that bring the industry to a new level. Today, we are going to look at the most relevant crypto news that has happened recently. Ethereum Dencun Update Launched On March 13, the long-awaited Ethereum Dencun update was released, […]

The post Weekly Crypto News: Mempool Solana Shuts Down, Police Integrate Cardano Into Their Work, WhiteBIT And FC Barcelona Launch New Course first appeared on Foresight News EN.

item.title: AI-based Web3 DID Platform GenomeFi acquires DMCC License
item.content:encoded:
摘要：这些信息是积极的。
GenomeFi是一个专门的Web3平台，提供基于个体基因特征的分散身份（DID）服务，使用NFT。他们宣布收购了迪拜多商品中心（DMCC）内的一家企业，并获得了自由贸易区牌照。通过人工智能技术，GenomeFi促进基因信息为基础的NFT交易。

GenomeFi, a specialized Web3 platform providing Decentralized Identity (DID) services based on individual genetic characteristics using NFTs, has announced the acquisition of a business incorporation and a free zone license within the Dubai Multi Commodities Center (DMCC) in Dubai, United Arab Emirates (UAE) on the 18th. Using AI technology, GenomeFi facilitates genetic information-based NFTs to […]

The post AI-based Web3 DID Platform GenomeFi acquires DMCC License first appeared on Foresight News EN.

item.title: ComplexCon HK Teams Up with Newman Group to Welcome Hong Kong as the Next Web3 Hub
item.content:encoded:
'

摘要：
这些信息是积极的。ComplexCon香港与Newman Group宣布战略联盟，成为官方Web3合作伙伴，通过现实体验推动大众消费者采用Web3技术，塑造Web3生态系统中的文化。在InvestHK的支持下，他们致力于将香港定位为Web3创新的首要中心。

ComplexCon Hong Kong proudly announces its groundbreaking strategic alliance with Newman Group as the Official Web3 Partner, making a significant stride in boosting mass consumer adoption and shaping cultures within the Web3 ecosystem through real-life experiences. Together with the support of InvestHK, they aspire to position Hong Kong as the premier hub for Web3 innovation. […]

The post ComplexCon HK Teams Up with Newman Group to Welcome Hong Kong as the Next Web3 Hub first appeared on Foresight News EN.

item.title: Analyst Announces Bull Run Start, Cites Stock-to-Flow Strategy
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是积极的。Reputable analyst PlanB基于Stock-to-Flow研究报告了FOMO期的开始 - 牛市市场。他指出积累阶段已经结束，在有序缓慢增长的市场中不再有轻松的购买机会。然而，这种方法并非最佳选择，因为它可能存在一些缺陷。

PlanB utilises his own Stock-to-Flow strategy to come up with bull run analysis. Discovering why this methodology is not the best option.  Reputable analyst PlanB reported the beginning of FOMO period – bull run market – based on the Stock-to-Flow research. “Accumulation phase has ended: no more easy buying opportunities in orderly and slowly increasing markets” – […]

The post Analyst Announces Bull Run Start, Cites Stock-to-Flow Strategy  first appeared on Foresight News EN.

item.title: All You Need To Know To Secure Your Data From Phishing
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是消极的。Phishing措施变得越来越必要，因为黑客每天都在试图在线上窃取个人信息和资金。最近的一份报告显示，2月份约有57,000名受害者因加密钓鱼诈骗遭受了约4700万美元的损失。大多数受害者是通过钓鱼网站引诱进入...

Phishing measures are becoming increasingly necessary as hackers attempt to steal your personal information and funds online every day. According to a recent report by Scam Sniffer, in February, about 57,000 victims suffered losses of around $47 million due to crypto phishing scams. They pointed out that “most victims were lured to phishing websites through […]

The post All You Need To Know To Secure Your Data From Phishing first appeared on Foresight News EN.

item.title: Consensys CEO and His Vision On The Future Of Cryptocurrencies
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是积极的。Consensys CEO Joseph Lubin在一次ETHDenver活动中分享了他对去中心化带来的态度变革的愿景。他认为，当前金融体系正在崩溃，基于去中心化和区块链技术的新金融体系即将出现。根据Lubin的说法，这将引发世界上的一场重大转型。

At a recent ETHDenver event, Consensys CEO Joseph Lubin shared his vision of the generational shift in attitudes brought about by decentralization. He believes that the world is on the verge of a major transformation as the current financial system collapses and a new one based on decentralization and blockchain technologies emerges. According to Lubin, […]

The post Consensys CEO and His Vision On The Future Of Cryptocurrencies first appeared on Foresight News EN.

item.title: Is Crypto Entering 2021 Vibes?
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是积极的。加密市场似乎重回2021年的繁荣状态，引起了人们对行业的怀旧情绪。2024年以来，市场的关注度没有下降，比特币和以太坊的引人注目头条如雨后春笋般涌现。与以往不同的是，市场异常繁荣，而且人们对市场的关注始终如一。

Is crypto back? More and more telltale signs nostalgically bring the industry to the feeling of 2021, remembered by its stark performance. What’s different this time?  Since 2024 stepped in, there was not a single day when the attention to the market waned. Catchy Bitcoin and Ether headlines have been sprouting up like mushrooms as […]

The post Is Crypto Entering 2021 Vibes? first appeared on Foresight News EN.
